songs.title: A Nigga Like You (Solo Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro]

[Bridge: XXXTENTACION]
Wish upon a star my joddessy
Wish upon a star my joddessy
Wish upon a star my joddessy (Ayy, ayy)
Wish upon a star my joddessy
Wish upon a star my joddessy
Wish upon a star my joddessy (Ayy)

[Verse: XXXTENTACION]
Hmm, wrist slit, like get this
Resent with no shifts in this mistress
I left her unconscious, her wrist slit
A cut on my dick, please don't fix it (Aye)
Addy, addy but the boppin' pistol poppin' (Yeah)
Cheap and filthy, you gon' catch us kissing (Yeah, yeah)
You said this is worth it, bitch, I'm addy honest
God, it never makes a difference, stop it, please..

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION]
A nigga like you like to talk (Talk)
A nigga like you like to talk
A nigga like you like to talk (Talk, talk)
A nigga like you like to talk
A nigga like you like to talk (Talk, talk)
A nigga like you like to talk
A nigga like you like to talk (Ayy, ayy, ayy)

[Outro: XXXTENTACION]
A nigga like you like to talk (Talk, talk)
A nigga like you like to talk
A nigga like you like to talk (Talk)
